unnormalised: Arre yaar, mhaka Diwali sale-ant Myntra-ntlean mazyen aai kiteer ek saree ghenvk poddtaalo, ani payment 3 vella fail jaali! Poile, hanven SBI debit card vaprun, ani ₹5,500 ami amount astana "Transaction declined" dhakhoilo. Magir hanven UPI vaprunk prayatn kelo, thodek borek sanglyar Google Pay, ani teenuy zali error. Nimanne, hanven net banking vaprun zali, punn te 20 rupya extra transaction fee karch kortalyapori na. Kitlee tras 5.5k rupya karch korte!
normalised: arre yaar, Diwali-chea sale-ant Myntra-toon mazo aai-k saree ghevnk proxit kelo, ani payment teen pavtti fail zale! poilem, hanv mazo S-B-I debit card vaparlo, ani tannen "Transaction declined" dakhoylem, rupia panch hazar panchshe rupya amount asli. magir hanv U-P-I vaprunk proxit kelo, sarka Google Pay-ak, ani tankuy ek error dakhoylo. nimanne, hanv net banking vaparlo, ani tem zalen, punn rupia vees transaction fee zaun kitlench mhunnchea adhi nhoi. fokot rupia panch point panch hazar kharch korunk kitlem tras!
text: Arre yaar, mhaka Diwali sale-ant Myntra-ntlean mazyen aai kiteer ek saree ghenvk poddtaalo, ani payment 3 vella fail jaali! Poile, hanven SBI debit card vaprun, ani ₹5,500 ami amount astana "Transaction declined" dhakhoilo. Magir hanven UPI vaprunk prayatn kelo, thodek borek sanglyar Google Pay, ani teenuy zali error. Nimanne, hanven net banking vaprun zali, punn te 20 rupya extra transaction fee karch kortalyapori na. Kitlee tras 5.5k rupya karch korte!
